import fire from"./fire";//Add new transaction
export var addTrans=function addTrans(uid,_ref,successFn,errorFn){var type=_ref.type,amount=_ref.amount,category=_ref.category,date=_ref.date,desc=_ref.desc;var obj={user:uid,type:type,amount:amount,category:category,date:date,desc:desc};var db=fire.firestore();db.collection("transactions").add(obj).then(function(res){return successFn(res);}).catch(function(err){return errorFn(err);});};//Get the Cards by Filter - "INC","EXP"
export var getTransactionByFilter=function getTransactionByFilter(uid,filter,successFn,errorFn){var db=fire.firestore();//Setting if else as per filter
if(filter==="INC"){//Defailt "ALL" Case
db.collection("transactions").where("user","==",uid).where("type","==","INC").get().then(function(res){return successFn(res);}).catch(function(err){return errorFn(err);});}else if(filter==="EXP"){//Defailt "ALL" Case
db.collection("transactions").where("user","==",uid).where("type","==","EXP").get().then(function(res){return successFn(res);}).catch(function(err){return errorFn(err);});}else{//Defailt "ALL" Case
db.collection("transactions").where("user","==",uid).get().then(function(res){return successFn(res);}).catch(function(err){return errorFn(err);});}};
